name: A day in the life of a Monke
name_original: A day in the life of a Monke
description:
A PROTOTYPE VERSION. MAYBE A FULL-FLEDGED GAME IN THE FUTURE USING ACTUAL GAME ENGINES.

Ever wanted to be a Monke? Ever wanted to know how Monke spend their day?

Well fear no more. THIS IS THE DAY YOU GET TO BECOME A PURE MONKE!

NOTE FOR PLAYERS: Since this is a PowerPoint file, it can easily be data-mined. Please don't. And even if you do, don't spoil it in the comments. Try to understand.
